elements.text: You and your partner have been dating long-distance for awhile and you're going to be living in the same place in just a few months. You’ve never lived in the same place before, and you’re not quite sure how this change could impact your relationship. Even though you feel a bit nervous, you know that this is...

elements.name: Ending Long Distance_Mental Health_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
